cancel().Description: Cancels this key. If this key has not yet been cancelled then it is added to its selector's cancelled-key set while synchronized on that set.

Returns: true if, and only if, this key is valid
isValid().Description: Tells whether or not this key is valid. A key is valid upon creation and remains so until it is cancelled, its channel is closed, or its selector is closed.

AbstractSelectionKey().Description: Initializes a new instance of this class.

ClassDesc: Base implementation class for selection keys. This class tracks the validity of the key and implements cancellation.
